name: Crop Vagabond
description:
You have snuck into the realm of nefarious Lord Landlord, where his minions claim whatever was produced from the land.

You, as a Ninja-farmer, have to sow seeds, grow vegetations, and make money by selling the products behind Lord Landlord's back.

Press Arrow Keys to move.
Press Q, W, E, R and D to change the item you are holding. D key is designated for the weapon slot.

Press Space to interact. You will use the item if you are holding an item. If you are holding a weapon or no item, you will perform an attack.
Press and hold Space to disguise. You will not attract enemies while disguised.

Interact while holding a seed to plant it. Attack grown plants to destroy it and get products.
Products have different effects of use. You may use them or sell them to gain money (the score).

Wizard-Rye restores a bit of your health.
Tomatowk can be thrown and deal damage to the enemy hit.
Agilea increases your movement speed for a short period of time.
Disap-Pear makes you invisible for a short period of time.
Whettails increases your attack damage for a short period of time.
Marigold can't be used, but it sells for a high price.
Fool's Marigold will explode and deal damage to enemy nearby.

You have to watch out for Lord Landlord's minions: Serfs will harvest any vegetations in sight, and Catchers will hunt you down.

Serfs and Catchers cannot see objects behind obstacles.

Game Design & Art by Paul "Sarutan" Lee

Programming by Hanbin Kim
